event.description: Grady Sizemore grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Asdrubal Cabrera strikes out swinging.
Victor Martinez grounds out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Shin-Soo Choo grounds out, shortstop Nick Green to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Mark DeRosa singles on a ground ball to right fielder J. Drew.
David Dellucci grounds into a double play, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to shortstop Nick Green to first baseman Jeff Bailey. Mark DeRosa out at 2nd.
Jhonny Peralta strikes out on a foul tip.
Ben Francisco walks.
Kelly Shoppach walks. Ben Francisco to 2nd.
Grady Sizemore flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jonathan Van Every. Ben Francisco scores. Kelly Shoppach to 2nd.
Victor Martinez flies out to center fielder Jonathan Van Every.
Shin-Soo Choo singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Jonathan Van Every.
Mark DeRosa grounds out, pitcher Justin Masterson to first baseman Jeff Bailey. Shin-Soo Choo to 2nd.
David Dellucci strikes out swinging.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Ben Francisco grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Kelly Shoppach hit by pitch.
Grady Sizemore strikes out swinging.
Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a ground ball to shortstop Nick Green. Kelly Shoppach to 2nd.
Victor Martinez doubles (9) on a fly ball to right fielder J. D. Drew. Kelly Shoppach scores. Asdrubal Cabrera scores.
Shin-Soo Choo singles on a line drive to center fielder Jonathan Van Every. Victor Martinez scores.
Mark DeRosa walks. Shin-Soo Choo to 2nd.
David Dellucci grounds out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Ben Francisco strikes out swinging.
Kelly Shoppach strikes out swinging.
Grady Sizemore grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Asdrubal Cabrera triples (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Jason Bay.
Victor Martinez singles on a line drive to right fielder J. D. Drew. Asdrubal Cabrera scores.
Pitching Change: Hunter Jones replaces Justin Masterson.
Shin-Soo Choo pops out to shortstop Nick Green.
Mark DeRosa homers (6) on a fly ball to left field. Victor Martinez scores.
David Dellucci strikes out swinging, catcher Jason Varitek to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Ben Francisco pops out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Kelly Shoppach walks.
With Grady Sizemore batting, wild pitch by Hunter Jones, Kelly Shoppach to 2nd.
Grady Sizemore walks.
Asdrubal Cabrera flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Pitching Change: Javier Lopez replaces Hunter Jones.
Victor Martinez homers (6) on a fly ball to right field.
Shin-Soo Choo singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Jason Bay.
Mark DeRosa hits a ground-rule double (7) on a fly ball to right field. Shin-Soo Choo to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ryan Garko replaces David Dellucci.
Ryan Garko lines out to third baseman Mike Lowell.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Ben Francisco singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jason Bay. Shin-Soo Choo scores. Mark DeRosa out at home on the throw, left fielder Jason Bay to catcher Jason Varitek.
J. D. Drew singles on a line drive to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Dustin Pedroia grounds into a double play, shortstop Jhonny Peralta to second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez. Drew out at 2nd.
David Ortiz flies out to left fielder Ben Francisco.
Jason Bay walks.
Mike Lowell doubles (9) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Ben Francisco. Jason Bay to 3rd.
Jason Varitek walks.
Jeff Bailey grounds into a double play, second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to shortstop Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Victor Martinez. Jason Bay scores. Mike Lowell to 3rd. Jason Varitek out at 2nd.
Jonathan Van Every singles on a ground ball to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo, deflected by second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera. Mike Lowell scores.
Nick Green grounds into a force out, shortstop Jhonny Peralta to second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera. Jonathan Van Every out at 2nd.
J. D. Drew grounds out, second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Dustin Pedroia grounds out, third baseman Mark DeRosa to first baseman Victor Martinez.
David Ortiz walks.
Jason Bay strikes out swinging.
Mike Lowell flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Jason Varitek doubles (6) on a fly ball to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Jeff Bailey hit by pitch.
Jonathan Van Every singles on a ground ball to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo. Jason Varitek to 3rd. Jeff Bailey to 2nd.
Nick Green strikes out on a foul tip.
J. D. Drew grounds out, second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Dustin Pedroia pops out to third baseman Mark DeRosa in foul territory.
David Ortiz singles on a soft fly ball to left fielder Ben Francisco.
Jason Bay strikes out swinging.
Mike Lowell flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Jason Varitek grounds out, second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Jeff Bailey grounds out, shortstop Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Jonathan Van Every called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Aaron Laffey replaces Carl Pavano.
Nick Green flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
J. D. Drew lines out to left fielder Ben Francisco.
Dustin Pedroia grounds out, shortstop Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Victor Martinez.
David Ortiz grounds out, second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Jason Bay grounds out, third baseman Mark DeRosa to first baseman Victor Martinez.
Mike Lowell flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Ryan Garko remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Jason Varitek singles on a ground ball to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
Jeff Bailey called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Julio Lugo replaces Jonathan Van Every.
Julio Lugo singles on a line drive to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo. Jason Varitek to 3rd.
Nick Green grounds into a double play, third baseman Mark DeRosa to second baseman Asdrubal Cabrera to first baseman Victor Martinez. Julio Lugo out at 2nd.
